title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.191 - Waiver
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.191 - Waiver

State Regulations

The permit-issuing official may waive, in writing, any of the requirements of this Subpart, and the waiver included as a condition of the permit to operate, when it reasonably appears that the public health will not be endangered by such waiver. All such waivers are to be only for the same period as the term of the permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.191

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
